parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current percentage of mass from items stored in a backpack relative to the maximum capacity of the backpack.<br>
It is equivalent to this formula:
<code>_loadBackpack <template><title>=</title></template> massOfAllItemsInBackpack / [[getContainerMaxLoad]] [[backpack]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[loadBackpack]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _myVariable = [[loadBackpack]] myUnit;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[load]], [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]], [[loadUniform]], [[loadVest]], [[getMass]], [[weightRTD]], [[getContainerMaxLoad]]
</value></part></template>
